text: Va monandn on zan, ki riştaero, ki mahkam tofta ʙud, az ham kuşud va qit'a-qit'a kard, maʙoşed, to savgandhoi xudro vasilai fireʙi jakdigar sozed, ʙa in ʙahona, ki gurūhe ʙeştar az gurūhi digar ast. Xudo şumoro ʙa on meozmojad va dar rūzi qijomat cizero, ki dar on ixtilof mekarded, ʙarojaton ʙajon mekunad
